entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 2:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: W 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Flurries beginning near noon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening and after midnight. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
